column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////Hotel manager recommended this place to me. I've tried Giordano's and Piazano's
column2: I personally don't like Giordano's at all... It was not crust enough
column3: but I can't tell the difference between Lou Malnati's and Piazano's. They are both very good and definitely worth trying! We went with small Chicago deep dish classic
column4: Italian soup and buffalo wings... And of course
column5: we couldn't finish the wings because the pizza itself was so stuffing.
